website_summaries.verdict: For those who dislike an overly snug tennis shoe that seems to pinch, this adidas shoe has a wide design and a comfortable feel throughout, along with a breathable mesh fabric.
pros: Very reasonable price for a high-quality tennis shoe
Excellent tread pattern provides the grip you need on multiple court surfaces
More cushioning in the insole than you receive in the typical tennis shoe
cons: All three designs have no bright colors – only comes in black, silver, and white

customer_reviews.title: Awful for tennis, no support. Save your ankles! Steer clear!
customer_reviews.text: Have always liked Adidas sneakers but this, unfortunately, is easily the worst tennis shoe I have ever worn. The only thing about this shoe that seems to even qualify it as a tennis shoe is the thick sole. It's basically a slipper with a thick sole. I wore them on the court twice and rolled both my ankles... I have never had ankle problems in my life. If you move around on the court aggressively, these are not for you. Bought these banking on Adidas living up to some reasonable standard, but these fall well short.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great pickleball shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for some other Adidas shoes that were being used for pickleball. These shoes work very well. I wouldn't hesitate to buy again. I had bought a shoe that was recommended for pickleball but is considered a running shoe and soon thereafter rolled an ankle playing in them. These shoes give solid footing and a wide base to avoid being able to do just that. I highly recommend them if you are interested in finding a new shoe for the pickleball court!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Becker

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size down for your correct size.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice but they are “Mismarked”. They say UK 10 1/2 & US 11 which is incorrect. A UK 10 1/2 is actually an 11 1/2 so that’s why they are a 1/2 size to big. Order a 1/2 size down.
customer_reviews.author: Marshell Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit around the ankle which provides added support for quick movement.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit! Shoe provides for a snug fit like a glove around the ankle. I use the shoes when plying table tennis, Silver Sneakers and Pickleball. Soles are excellent and thus far skid free! Light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Just do Adidas
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me &:not buying Nike anymore, Adidas is the way to go!! Way cool shoes. Outstanding comfort & quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart after about 30 court uses
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Very comfortable shoes, love the fit of the sock liner and integrated tongue, received numerous comments about the good looks. Cons - insoles are garbage (not that I was expecting them to be great), large toebox (I want my entire foot to feel snug when on the courts), lateral support feels non-existent because the entire upper is mesh (except for the heelcup), durability of the overall build is lacking (see picture of sole separation).
customer_reviews.author: Bossypug

customer_reviews.title: Comfy nice looking, does not hold up for a toe-dragger
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who always wears a 12. I have the same shoes I recently purchased in a half size down due to the number of reviews that said it runs large. So I did the same for my husband- 11.5, and it fits him perfectly. He says comfortable, but very quickly starting to show wear at big toe bone area, however, he drags his toe a lot when he plays tennis. I don’t think these shoes will last him nearly as long as they will last me. Update: hole after three months of wear for tennis only
customer_reviews.author: tpdds

customer_reviews.title: A Mistake
customer_reviews.text: They were on sale for $33 so I bought them. Wore them for 5 minutes and decided the outsole is too hard. Now they are collecting dust. Don't be fooled by "comfortable" reviews! They are talking about the top of the shoe and not the bottom. The bottom is made of very hard rubber while the top is made of very comfortable materials.
customer_reviews.author: noagenda

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe and wearing well
customer_reviews.text: Just a little wider in the foot area than I expected for not ordering a wide show.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes for exactly 1 month. They are good shoes at first but mine started to tear and then just completely fell apart. Both shoes started to rip in the same place and then about a week later were done. I am a golf caddie so I walk more than the normal person but not on anything but grass. Very frustrating to have a shoe fall apart after one month. I would stick with Nike as the customer service number I called was not much help at all. I would stay far away from these shoes if you need something durable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I can feel the quality I would expect on a hard court and it's very good. I have a fairly wide foot so these and all of Adidas tennis court shoes tend to be too narrow for me but after a couple days wearing them and breaking them in they feel comfortable. Sadly I can't give it 5 stars because they shipped it to me with the shoelaces ripped and frayed on both shoes. Probably someone being clumsy with a box cutter at the adidas factory when they were made.
customer_reviews.author: ryan fernald

customer_reviews.title: Good basic tennis shoes. Moderate competitiveness
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable for matches. Good feet planting, but might sacrifice nimbleness. Love the material, feels comfortable but durable.
customer_reviews.author: jaygu

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for tennis, travel, and weekends
customer_reviews.text: For casual wear, you almost don't need laces on this because the neoprene inner layer is a full wrap around ankle sock. The laces are handy for a tighter fit when you actually want to play tennis or some other sport. It's light weight, packs well, and looks good. I usually wear an 11 E dress shoe and 11.5 athletic shoe. I ordered the 11.5 Adidas gamecourt tennis shoe and it fit well. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy shoe with good lateral stability, weight is just right. Fit is generous without causing you to need to size down. Good job, Adidas!
customer_reviews.author: Coach Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: The minute I received them I used them in a plyometric workout and they were phenomenal. Very comfortable and cushioned making my jumps easier and lighter on my legs and joints. Would recommend to anyone in the CrossFit, plyometric, or HIIT world or any workout that is high impact.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L.

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure they're real
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in a plastic bag and not an Adidas box... honestly making me wonder if they're real Adidas and not Taiwan knock-offs. I ordered a 10 and they look big, but they seem to fit okay. I just don't know if they're real Adidas... I've been fooled before.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Fields

customer_reviews.title: Very good at this price range
customer_reviews.text: This shoes is very good for playing tennis. They fit well and very comfortable. They also really look good when you wear them and looks fashionable. The quality seems to be very good, I have had this shoes for more than 6 months and I see no damage to the shoes and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Anantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes - second pair
customer_reviews.text: My son has wide feet, but Adidas usually work in regular widths so we ordered theses and they worked great. He said they were snug at first, but broke in within a few hours. They’ve held up well and spot cleaned easily. They are bright white and he’s a teenager so this is the second pair I’ve ordered.
customer_reviews.author: cristiti2

customer_reviews.title: Poor Tongue Design
customer_reviews.text: Returned these due to difficulty in putting them on. The tongue is sewn its entire length to the body of the shoe so the shoe does not open enough to put on. Too bad - seemed like they would have played well. Maybe 15-yr olds won't mind wrestling with them but I can't.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Good tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son played varsity tennis in them till the soles had holes. He liked the shoes and said they really helped when stopping and changing directions quickly on concrete courts. He also commented that the shoes looked like they were too big when they arrived, but they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good slam for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Nice grip, cool look, comfortable, very good toe/ankle support. A bit hard bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Albert S.

customer_reviews.title: Awful shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes have very little arch support and run small. For some reason Adidas has decided people want the tongue of the shoe to be sewn to the base. I do not. It makes it hard to get your foot into and uncomfortable. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: The Duke of Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Soft, flexible sole. Large size runs very small.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a nice shoe. The sole is a bit too soft and flexible for my taste. The size 16 runs quite small, probably at least one full size small. I had to read the shoe carefully to be convinced it really was supposed to be a 16.
customer_reviews.author: Just an ordinary guy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought three different shoes for work, the gym and casual wear. All around $60. This one was the best quality for the price. A really good fit, easy to slip on and off but enough structure to workout in. Medium weight. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Corban Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Size is on par!! Price is even better!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas. It’s July he’s still wearing them. Besides a few puppy chew marks they look as good as when we bought them!! Great shoes for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Good for Tennis but Different
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits well and gives me good traction on the court. The tongue is attached to the body of the shoe all the way to the foot opening so it's tight to put on but then feels nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Overly padded toebox
customer_reviews.text: Big on the outside only. Padding under the mesh front, makes it just another dinky toebox shoe. It may be wider than some but nothing like as comfortable as a Topo Athletic or Altra. Too bad they don’t make tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewbert

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that the size would be an issue but it fits as all your shoes do. They are comfortable and allows air to flow throughout them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leo Johnson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: 10 or 10 Wide?
customer_reviews.text: White/gray/black was ordered as 10, was listed as 10, and delivery notification was for 10. However we received 10 Wide. Dick’s only sells this color combo in Wide sizes. It may be that there are no10s for these. Easy, fast, and hassle free refund/return, so no big deal at all, but just be aware of potential in this color combo. Tried on the shoes in store and felt very nice, supportive, and still lightweight, so probably a good shoe. We will just get another color.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Great support, perfect for tennis.
customer_reviews.text: Great support in heal counter. I feel very stable in the shoe without being weighed down or less agile. There's always a trade off in that regard but the shoes are relatively light for the profile. Perfect for Har Tru court tennis.
customer_reviews.author: CCNY

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t look like the photo
customer_reviews.text: For me, I didn’t think the shoe looked like the picture, I don’t like them, I will keep them only because I didn’t keep the receipt. I will probably give them away.
customer_reviews.author: G.P.

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Git these for my son who loves handball. He goes through sneakers often. These lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable court shoes. They appear to be good quality and should hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jr56279

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These have been great - so comfortable and have worked well for playing. I'm not a pro, but they work great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Ordered this for my 13 year old son for tennis practices. No complaints from him & the shoe seems to be holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My favorite comfortable Tennis Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, will buy more. Comfortable show. Not that supportive but good enough. And fits a wide foot even with normal sized ratings on the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Son likes them for his tennis team. Decent price. I would buy them for him again.
customer_reviews.author: wlw3

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, Fit, Color, and Style
customer_reviews.text: Bought my son shoes. Exactly what I expected, e.g. fit, color. Delivered within timeframe as promised. Really nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for playing tennis
customer_reviews.text: For the price these shoes are very good. I can't say about durability yet because I've only used 3 times for playing tennis. However I think they will do okay.
customer_reviews.author: MARIO VIGNALI

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color n comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great color scheme, very comfortable and easy slide on great for walking or tennis. Three people stopped to ask where they can get. Please produce more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bobay

customer_reviews.title: Has great padding and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teenage son. He says they are more comfortable than most shoes we have purchased previously.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal m.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. My son is very rough on his shoes when he plays, but these have held up all tennis season!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug with the unique inside layer. Feels a little heavy but that was expected. Otherwise, no complaints after 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: BeeGe

customer_reviews.title: Great court shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for outdoor pickleball. I love them. Great traction on the court and comfortable. I can play for hours and my feet feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Bacon Boy 24

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great tennis shoes for any type of player. They are really comfortable and provide great ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: HARDIK

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love here??
customer_reviews.text: I am a sneaker man and Adidas is my all time favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great PB shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear for PB....they seem sturdy and Adituff. I have wide foot and they are super comfortable with support. They squeak like crazy on PB courts though....lol
customer_reviews.author: Steven O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for going out to dinner or for casual use.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great use as a casual shoe for alternative to shoes I work in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit me perfectly. Very easy to put on, very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Juan P Borjas

customer_reviews.title: All Day I Dream About Size
customer_reviews.text: great shoes. look good too. sizes run a little big and toe cup is large for my normal (narrow?) feet? Still rock them tho!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best court shoe I love so far
customer_reviews.text: This is a smart looking court shoe and It hugs my foot so nicely and comfortably, that I don’t feel any aches or pain , after playing 2 hours of racquetball. Will buy again and highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: rivermonster

customer_reviews.title: If The Shoe Fits
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good looking shoe. I've ordered several pair of the same model, different colors.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have always been kind of disappointed with tennis shoes' fit for my son. NO MORE!!!!! this shoe was not only a great fit but also comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: rams

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: these didnt even last a month of highschool tennis! Developed a hole in the toe area. Wish I could get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Durability Issues
customer_reviews.text: The front of the shoe completely ripped apart after ~1.5 months of moderate use on tennis courts. Would not recommend purchasing such a poorly designed shoe and will be looking elsewhere for my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: KevinH

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Just started playing tennis, and I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: R Lopez

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My son has difficulty finding shoes that are comfortable. He loves everything about these sneakers. Very comfortable and he says they are great in the courts.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P

customer_reviews.title: Solid hardcourt tennis shoe. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid tennis shoe and does well on the court. A bit wide in the front of the shoe for me. Could've been tighter but the length was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Frye

customer_reviews.title: Best Tennis Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tennis shoes I've ever had. I bought another pair just in case they stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Norton

customer_reviews.title: good shoes and good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because i already have a pair and I like how they fit. I use them to play tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Alfixall4u

customer_reviews.title: Decent sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Love them, use them for tennis, Racquetball, & basketball. Fit nice and comfy, I just wear them for playing I don’t use them for day to day and they have lasted like any other sneaker. Will buy again👍🏻✌🏻Oh and good for my wide foot too!
customer_reviews.author: Mark V.

customer_reviews.title: I like the slip on fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes work for my purposes as a rn student for clinical rotations, so i cant say how they are as tennis shoes. Theyre comfortable and grip wet surfaces really well
customer_reviews.author: ryan thorp

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes...especially the LACK of a tongue!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried initially but turned out I like them even better than my last court Adidas. LOVE these. Wish there were some additional color selections though
customer_reviews.author: W. Douglas Silvester

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for only a month and a half with only moderate use and they were absolutely destroyed and killed my feet. Wkrst money I've ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe ripped after three times playing with it and the seller doesn’t reply to the issue. Bought two pairs. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Portal

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Little bit of a snug fit. I do like them however. You may want to get a half size bigger than you might usually get.
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: Great look & price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the price. I always get complements about the looks. It’s great shoes for playing Pickleball
customer_reviews.author: Nora bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough if you have any footwork
customer_reviews.text: 3 wears in and the bottom rubber is coming up. Doubt these will make it a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes for anything in the gym.
customer_reviews.text: Great traction, comfortable, look good. What else do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Dale H

customer_reviews.title: Great pickleball shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot and they wear better than any shoe I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Obone

customer_reviews.title: quality tennis shoe build
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with comfort and the build quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Frankovich

customer_reviews.title: Attractive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe for money. Fit as expected. Good quality. Love the style.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sport shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes for very well, feel a bit loose for tennis shoes. Very comfortable. Arrived a few days faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Krug

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I like them buy im 7.5 in girls and that was the size I order and still too big now I cant use them.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and style
customer_reviews.text: These are the most durable and comfortable shoes I've worn inbwuite some time. Adidas has designed quality again in these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F

customer_reviews.title: great tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I dont know how they were so cheap, fit great!
customer_reviews.author: charles moore

customer_reviews.title: Feels as Good as it Looks
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I’m playing better as well. Whether it’s the shoe or not I’m loving these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Norton

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoe! Not a Tennis Player but the Shoe has a great Look. I will be getting some more.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. these feel amazing, great support too
customer_reviews.author: redmateria

customer_reviews.title: God, affordable shoe for new tennis player
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, who just started high school tennis, and they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son liked the shoe very much. Great service as well
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. Comfortable with its elastic tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, comfort, style
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased because of the low cost. To my surprise, they are one of my favorite sneakers. Very comfortable, stylish, great for running or everyday where. Thinking about buying another pair!
customer_reviews.author: edwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend. He wears them everywhere lol
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fit is true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, the width is snug but length is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Lummus

customer_reviews.title: nice tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: i got these to play tennis and they are very comfotable. great for tennis
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Buy a shoe horn.
customer_reviews.text: A very good court shoe and a good price. You do need a shoe horn to get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Markk

customer_reviews.title: Seams
customer_reviews.text: Only had a few months and the seams are starting to come undone. Overall good fit
customer_reviews.author: J Kinsel

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: Look and feel great. These are well worth the $55.00
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Madruga

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: delivered on time and the shoe is light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Get a 1/2 size smaller will fit perfectly. Lols good, feels good
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Great Tennis sneaker
customer_reviews.text: My teen loves them. Fit as expected and were described to be super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: A. Vega

customer_reviews.title: great for my son's tennis matches
customer_reviews.text: fit as expected. second pair of these we have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Duchene

customer_reviews.title: Lacking in sole strength
customer_reviews.text: It's a snug fit, which isn't so bad, but the soles are a problem. I'm having trouble with sore soles after a just a few sets. There is not a lot of cushion in the soles . This is the first pair of adidas that hasn't worked out so well, I won't get these again.
customer_reviews.author: stephan parylak

customer_reviews.title: Good tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for tennis. Good tennis shoes. Comfortable. Easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run large. Be shore know your size
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because sizes run large. And found it very difficult to swop for another pair. So went to local sporting store
customer_reviews.author: David Shields

customer_reviews.title: they feel great
customer_reviews.text: The first size 16 EE tennis shoes I've owned that I liked in 10 years. Looks great, feels great . Just ordered another pair just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great Tennis shoes, excellent traction and support. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Chinh Bui

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! It fits perfect very comfortable and perfect for running, I use them for everything. They're awesome and they're not expensive! They were better then my $180 nike shoes from finish line.
customer_reviews.author: anas

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, especially for the money. Great stabilization, and I use them for pickleball exclusively. Will need another pair soon!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Mclemore

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Gamecourt
product_meta.description: Serve up some style when you hit the club. The breathable mesh upper on these lightweight tennis shoes hugs your foot to support every move. A cushioned midsole keeps you comfortable from the moment you pull them on. The durable outsole gives a firm grip with every serve and slide as you improve your game. They're made with a wide fit.
feature_bullets: Breathable tennis shoes with a Cloudfoam midsole for extra comfort
Breathable mesh upper with TPU reinforcements for support
Adituff for best abrasion resistance in the toe area; Adiwear outsole offers the ultimate in high-wear durability
Cloudfoam midsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning
